layout.name: health
layout.title: Main Health
layout.tooltip: How many hits it takes the NPC to die.

layout.name: healthUnique
layout.title: Health Before Unique Attacks
layout.tooltip: How many hits it takes the NPC before it can use unique attacks. Set it to '0' to already enable it to use unique attacks

layout.name: movementPlayStyle1
layout.title: Movement Play Style Phase 1
layout.tooltip: Determines how she moves in 1st phase. Needs to be accorded to the phase extra settings to make this work.

layout.name: movementPlayStyle2
layout.title: Movement Play Style Phase 2
layout.tooltip: Determines how she moves in 2nd phase. Needs to be accorded to the phase extra settings to make this work.

layout.name: movementPlayStyle3
layout.title: Movement Play Style Phase 3
layout.tooltip: Determines how she moves in 3rd phase. Needs to be accorded to the phase extra settings to make this work.

layout.name: attackPlayStyle1
layout.title: Attack Play Style Phase 1
layout.tooltip: Determines how she attacks throughout the 1st phase. She'll commit attacks once her unique health points are depleted. Needs to be accorded to the phase extra settings to make this work.

layout.name: attackPlayStyle2
layout.title: Attack Play Style Phase 2
layout.tooltip: Determines how she attacks throughout the 2nd phase. Needs to be accorded to the phase extra settings to make this work.

layout.name: attackPlayStyle3
layout.title: Attack Play Style Phase 3
layout.tooltip: Determines how she attacks throughout the 3rd phase. Needs to be accorded to the phase extra settings to make this work.

layout.name: phase
layout.title: Phase (Difficulty)
layout.tooltip: Determines how aggresive he is throughout the fight.

layout.name: invincibleDelay
layout.title: Invincible Cooldown
layout.tooltip: How many frames it for her aggro state to calm down.

layout.name: speedXIncrease
layout.title: Swoop Speed X Increase
layout.tooltip: Increases the horizontal swoop speed throughout each phases.

layout.name: flyAroundVerticalSpeedCapAggro
layout.title: Fly Around Vertical Speed Cap Aggro

layout.name: flyAroundVerticalDistance
layout.title: Fly Around Vertical Distance
layout.tooltip: How many pixels the NPC moves in each vertical movement cycle.

layout.name: flyAroundVerticalAccelerateIncrease
layout.title: Fly Around Vertical Acceleration Increase
layout.tooltip: Increases the vertical swoop acceleration throughout each phases. Won't affect vertical swoop speed caps.

layout.name: chaseSpeedIncrease
layout.title: Chase Speed Increase
layout.tooltip: Increases the chase speed throughout each phases.

layout.name: chaseInterval
layout.title: Chase Interval
layout.tooltip: How many frames it takes for her to redirect the chase position.

layout.name: second
layout.title: Trigger event upon reaching her second phase?
layout.tooltip: Type in one of your events here.

layout.name: third
layout.title: Trigger event upon reaching her third phase?
layout.tooltip: Type in one of your events here.
